          <title>
            <string language="en">Production of carbon dioxide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produktion des Kohlendioxyds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Production d'anhydride carbonique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produção do dióxido de carbono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produzione dell'anidride carbonica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή του διοξειδίου του άνθρακα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción del bióxido de carbono</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates the test to see the production of carbon dioxide when a candle or a Bunsen burner burns.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conical flask</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Test, um die Produktion
des Kohlendioxyds zu sehen, wenn eine Kerze oder ein Bunsenbrenner 
brennt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre l'essai pour voir la
production de l'anhydride carbonique quand une bougie ou un brûleur 
de Bunsen brûle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra o teste para ver a 
produção do dióxido de carbono quando uma vela ou um queimador de 
Bunsen se queimam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra la prova per vedere
la produzione dell'anidride carbonica quando una candela o un 
bruciatore di Bunsen si brucia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει τη δοκιμή για να 
δει την παραγωγή του διοξειδίου του άνθρακα όταν 
καίει ένα κερί ή ένας καυστήρας Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra la prueba para 
considerar la producción del bióxido de carbono cuando una vela o 
una hornilla de Bunsen se quema.</string>
          </description>
